text: @realDonaldTrump ... because that’s our most pressing problem at this time.  Try coronavirus, racism, access to education, equal pay, equal rights, police reform, environment regulations to help stem global warming, voting rights and access, women’s rights, lgbtq rights. Thanks for nothing.
